title: [Drafix's Magic Shoppe]
[Drafix's Weaponry]
[Drafix's General Store]
[Drafix's Outfitting]
[Drafix's Combat Gear]
description: Enclosed by honey gold oak walls, the shop features a well-pruned lemon tree in the center of its gold oak floor.  A colorful Icemule map hangs under the stucco ceiling.  Right near the front is a heavy wooden desk and a narrow glass-topped table.
